title: Border, 18th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: bobbin lace, Valencienne ground
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Border of heavy linen worked in a provincial style. Pattern shows little human figures that alternate with an abstract motif.
